login.title: Login
login.description: Connect, to access to all the features of your favorite comment manager.
login.social: Connect with your Google account to provide access to your channel's comments, videos and playlists.

register.title: Signup
register.description: Connect with your Google account to provide access to your channel's comments, videos and playlists. Obviously, you will have total control over all the provided features and you will never post anything without your permission.
register.social: Connect with your Google account to provide access to your channel's comments, videos and playlists.

alerts.access_denied: You have cancelled the login process
alerts.state_misMatch: We are unable to verify the request. Please try again
